attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: mp's should not only repay all monies stolen from the country, but also pay interest on that amount, as it was in their bank account and also a fine to the sum of the stolen money.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
